The Rowlatt Act was passed in the year
Who was the first Indian native ruler to accept the system of Subsidiary Alliance?
With reference to the Indian freedom struggle, which one of the following is the correct chronological order of the given events?
Data.op1: Partition of Bengal - Lucknow Pact - Surat split of congress
Data.op2: Partition of Bengal - Surat split of congress - Lucknow Pact
Data.op3: Surat split of Congress - Partition of Bengal - Lucknow Pact
Data.op4: Surat split of congress - Lucknow Pact - Partition of Bengal

Data.op1: it sought to curb civil liberties of the Indians
Data.op3: it was an all-white commission without Indian representation
Data.op4: it proposed measures to contain nationalism

Which of the following was NOT the outcome of Jallianwala Bagh massacre?
Data.op1: Renunciation of the British titles and positions by many Indians
Data.op2: Change in Gandhiji’s attitude towards the British Government
Data.op4: Suspension of Gen. Dyer from service

Data.Question: ‘Khilafat Movement’ subsided because of :
Data.op1: the understanding reached between the Congress and the Muslim league
Data.op2: the concessions given to Muslims by the British
Data.op3: accession of Kemal Pasha to the throne of Turkey

Data.Question: Which party was in power in the U. K. when India became independent?
Data.op4: No party, since a National Government was in power there

Data.Question: The interim Government at the centre was formed in 1946 :
Data.op1: before the visit of the Cabinet Mission
Data.op2: after the visit of the Cabinet Mission
Data.op3: as a result of Cripps Mission
Data.op4: after Mountbatten came to India for transfer of power to Indians
